specs.name:
Front suspension: Independent dual-link MacPherson struts
							with gas-charged shocks

Rear suspension: 5-link independent monotube gas-charged
							shocks
Front strut tower brace with low-velocity control dampers
Ventilated front disc/solid rear disc brakes
Driver and front passenger side-impact airbags (SRS)
Front seatbelt pretensioners and force limiters
Rear LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for CHildren)
Remote keyless entry system with alarm
Dual fold-away heated power bodycolor side mirrors
HID Xenon headlights with auto leveling
Proximity Key entry with push button start
Power windows with driver's auto-down/up with pinch protection

Power driver seat slide with height adjustment and lumbar
							support
Driver and passenger side walk-in assist
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Navigation system with 7-inch touchscreen and NavTraffic

Complimentary SiriusXM activation and 3-month trial
							subscription

Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with information display
							screen
